abstract: Goldman Sachs will rehire Edward C. Forst as the firm’s senior strategy officer, after having left last year to become a senior adviser to Harvard and the entity that oversees the school’s endowment.
snippet: Goldman Sachs will rehire Edward C. Forst as the firm’s senior strategy officer, after having left last year to become a senior adviser to Harvard and the entity that oversees the school’s endowment.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs will rehire Edward C. Forst as the firm’s senior strategy officer, after having left last year to become a senior adviser to Harvard and the entity that oversees the school’s endowment.

headline.main: Goldman Rehires Forst as Senior Strategy Executive
